name: Arcana Heart 3 LOVEMAX SIXSTARS!!!!!!
description: New playable character "Minori Amanohara" and new Arcana "Ichor" the Blood joins the battle in "Arcana Heart 3 LOVEMAX SIXSTARS!!!!!!"! More new characters to join in future updates!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7900 GT or better / AMD Radeon X1900 / nVidia GeForce GT 620 (Windows 8.1) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or better / AMD Radeon HD3700 / nVidia GeForce GT 650 (Windows 8.1) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
